name: Christmas Panic (Leo Zacharias Jansson, JakeHasRadio)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam!

Evil drones has started to ruin Christmas by stealing gifts and disturbing the children, and it's your job to do something about it. Shoot down the drones with snowballs and give back Christmas gifts to the children to save the day!

How to play:

The goal of the game is to get as high score as you can before the time is up.

You get score by destroying drones and giving children gifts of the colour they want. Trucks come in with gifts at the top of the map every few seconds which you can pick up, but drones also have a random chance of dropping a gift when they're destroyed. To give gifts to children you can either throw the bottom gift in your hands with the left mouse button, or walk next to them and press the right mouse button, which will give them all gifts of the colour they want.

Controls:

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Right mouse button - Pick up / give gifts
Left mouse button (when holding gifts) - Throw gift / Place down all gifts (hold down)
Left mouse button (when not holding gifts) - Throw snowball
